subject: This Week on CBS SportsLine.com: Sweating out the summer

Sweating out the summer
Sweating out the summer Who'll follow Sam Perlozzo to the managerial chopping block? (AP)


    

      
      No baseball managers were fired while games were being played in 2006, 
      but in 2007, Sam Perlozzo is already gone. In Thursday's MLB Insider, Scott 
      Miller talks about Perlozzo's untenable situation in Baltimore -- 
      and who might be next to go. Preview
